name: [KDoWUT] Keep Dreaming or Wake Up Trying
name_original: [KDoWUT] Keep Dreaming or Wake Up Trying
description:
It's my first game jam and I'm happy to made it to the end!

I did everything myself except sound and music.

I'm not good at graphics but I joined late so I didn't team up but next time I will.

I failed to manage the resolution of the game.
